creditline: Gift of Mary and Robyn Campbell
description: three nude females; one woman at center in a tub is being pulled up by her hands by standing woman at L; woman at R bending over
markings: Numbered in pencil, LL: 72/101 (may be spurious)
provenance: Mary and Robyn Campbell, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2003.
signed: LRC, in pencil: Suzane Valadon | LRC on the stone, in black: Suzanne Valadon / 1928
title: Three Women Bathing
